title: Pakistan Navy demonstrates combat readiness through Live Weapon Firing
content:
Pakistan Navy on Wednesday demonstrated its combat readiness through Live Weapon Firing of Surface to air Missiles (SAMs).
“The launched missiles successfully engaged intended targets,” Pakistan Navy’s media wing said in a statement.
Opening batsman & #CT17 Hero @FakharZamanLive conferred the rank of honorary lieutenant of @PakistanNavy@dgprPaknavy
Congratulations Fakhar pic.twitter.com/qvrBndZPF4
— Abdul Ghaffar (@GhaffarDawnNews) December 28, 2020
Chief of Naval Staff Admiral Muhammad Amjad Khan Niazi graced the occasion as Chief Guest.
The Chief of Naval Staff express vigilance to thwart any aggression against Pakistan’s sea frontiers.
